EmailTemplate.subject: No One Likes Surveys
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
No One Likes Surveys Which is why we only ask for your input when it makes a big difference! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Public Safety Professional}},
TriTech realizes that no matter how good our products are, it is you – our customers – who define our reputation…and we’re committed to making it the best in the industry.
We would like to know how we are doing. This survey should take you less than 3 minutes, and will help us better serve you.
Thank you
Please take a few moments now to complete the survey by copying and pasting the link below into your browser:
https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_8wdNlTbRYLh6CVe An iPAD3® will be sent to one lucky winner selected from all survey participants.
